Headline 1: New York Lawyer Is a Trusted Guide to Doing Business in Nigeria
Headline 2: Wall Street law firm has deep experience in Nigerian market entry
Description: At Maduegbuna Cooper LLP, a Wall Street-based business advisory and litigation firm, we have for over 25 years worked on behalf of companies and individuals seeking to enter the high-rewards market that is Nigeria, a country that holds a large chunk of Africa’s wealth. There are substantial growth prospects in such Nigerian industries as consumer goods and the retail industry (including online shopping), real estate, information and communications technology, food and agriculture, and infrastructure development (especially power and transportation).

Headline 1: New York Lawyer Is a Trusted Guide to Doing Business in Nigeria
Headline 2: Wall Street law firm has deep experience in Nigerian market entry
Description: Founding partner Sam Maduegbuna, licensed to practice in Nigeria and in New York, is a highly sought-after adviser with strong ties and connections to Nigeria. Sam has a comprehensive understanding of the legal and business aspects involved in entering and taking a new business to Nigeria and investing in Nigeria, including production, financing, distribution, brand registration and protection, licensing, franchising, retail store leasing and exit vehicles. Since the start of his legal career, Sam has worked with an esteemed list of clients on a broad array of endeavors, ranging from telecommunications to banking, media and real estate, involving Nigeria.

Headline 1: New York Lawyer Is a Trusted Guide to Doing Business in Nigeria
Headline 2: Wall Street law firm has deep experience in Nigerian market entry
Description: For companies and individuals interested in expanding their business interests and operations to Nigeria, our attorneys routinely conduct market research in various industries and provide sound advice on market entry options and regulatory requirements. We provide support and assistance in the following areas:

Headline 2: Wall Street law firm has deep experience in Nigerian market entry
Description: Guided by experienced counsel, established multinationals can master operating in Nigeria’s regulatory and business environment and can make substantial profits in the country’s lucrative markets.

Headline 1: Nigeria Business Advisory Services
Headline 2: Wall Street law firm has deep experience in Nigerian market entry
Description: If you are interested in entering the Nigerian market and need an authoritative guide, consult Maduegbuna Cooper LLP in New York for dedicated personal attention and the highest quality service.

Headline 1: Nigeria Business Advisory Services
Headline 2: Helping Businesses explore rich prospects for growing revenue
Description: At Maduegbuna Cooper LLP, a Wall Street-based business advisory and litigation firm, we have for over 25 years worked on behalf of companies and individuals seeking to enter the high-rewards market that is Nigeria, a country that holds a large chunk of Africa’s wealth. There are substantial growth prospects in such Nigerian industries as consumer goods and the retail industry (including online shopping), real estate, information and communications technology, food and agriculture, and infrastructure development (especially power and transportation).

Headline 1: Nigeria Business Advisory Services
Headline 2: Helping Businesses explore rich prospects for growing revenue
Description: Founding partner Sam Maduegbuna, licensed to practice in Nigeria and in New York, is a highly sought-after adviser with strong ties and connections to Nigeria. Sam has a comprehensive understanding of the legal and business aspects involved in entering and taking a new business to Nigeria and investing in Nigeria, including production, financing, distribution, brand registration and protection, licensing, franchising, retail store leasing and exit vehicles. Since the start of his legal career, Sam has worked with an esteemed list of clients on a broad array of endeavors, ranging from telecommunications to banking, media and real estate, involving Nigeria.

Headline 1: Nigeria Business Advisory Services
Headline 2: Helping Businesses explore rich prospects for growing revenue
Description: For companies and individuals interested in expanding their business interests and operations to Nigeria, our attorneys routinely conduct market research in various industries and provide sound advice on market entry options and regulatory requirements. We provide support and assistance in the following areas:

Headline 1: Nigeria Business Advisory Services
Headline 2: Helping Businesses explore rich prospects for growing revenue
Description: Guided by experienced counsel, established multinationals can master operating in Nigeria’s regulatory and business environment and can make substantial profits in the country’s lucrative markets.

Headline 1: Nigeria Business Advisory Services
Headline 2: Helping Businesses explore rich prospects for growing revenue
Description: We strategically partner with top transactional Nigeria-based law firms for optimal service to clients. We directly supervise the engagements and, depending on the area, take the lead on the matter.
